locutie.beschrijving: A presidential address/sermon at the Progressive National Baptist Convention. It weaves together the memory of Martin Luther King Jr., the political climate of Washington D.C., the Vietnam War, and a theological defense of 'blackness' as a redemptive power.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: The exegesis is topical and typological. Biblical texts (Luke 9, Isaiah 40) are used as archetypes for the current socio-political experience of Black Americans.

illocutie.beschrijving: The preacher acts as a communal memory-keeper and a prophetic herald. The force shifts from commemorative assertion to prophetic directive.
voorbeelden: I make bold to throw out some hints of what it seems to me God is saying to us.
We must tell men and women that God loves this world.
I find it illuminating that Jesus called his disciples apart.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Mobilization, racial pride/identity formation, and political repentance.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit. The 'winds of change' and 'empowerment' suggest the Spirit's work, but it is not explicitly framed as the Spirit's perlocutionary act.

voorbeelden: One feels here in Washington that he stands close to the nerve center.
Progressive Baptists represent a new aspect of that division.
There is a power growing out of our experience of blackness.
America, what madness is upon you... hear from their graves!
We must tell the world that this God has credentials.
I rejoice that our Christian Education Congress goes forward.
I count the friendship... one of the rich rewards.
We still must secure land, and we will.
I shall not dwell upon our desire...
I turn to take my place loyally again in the ranks.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Weak. Most 'promises' are organizational commitments rather than Divine promises to the hearer.

voorbeelden: I pass on the standard of this host of the Lord.
To Jesus Christ be glory and honor...
declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate. The preacher exercises institutional authority (passing the standard) but rarely sacramental authority (forgiveness/blessing).

indicatoren: Extensive historical reporting on the PNBC history.
Describing the feelings of being in Washington.
Reporting on the actions of MLK and Robert Kennedy.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes a spectator of history and a student of sociology rather than a participant in a divine event.

missende_elementen: Sacramental declaration of the Gospel's present effect
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Inspiration without immediate transformation; the 'event' is deferred to the political sphere.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: None. The preacher describes God's power in the 3rd person rather than bestowing it in the 2nd person.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Used for presidential reporting and personal testimony ('I rejoice', 'I have come to see').

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Used mostly for 'America' (apostrophe) or the collective 'We'. Rare direct address to the individual soul.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used in the 'America' indictment, not in the Gospel promise.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Talking about MLK, the nation, the convention, and Jesus.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Heavy focus on the 1963 March on Washington and MLK's legacy.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: General truths about the 'power of blackness'.

actueel_present.gebruik: The immediate act of passing leadership.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (History/Sociology) -> Directive (We must tell/We must act).
voorbeelden: There is a power growing out of our experience... We must take this stand.
foutief_patroon.probleem: The 'must' (Directive) is not preceded by a 'God gives to you' (Commissive/Declarative), leading to moralism.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Missing the link of the Promise.

voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: We must tell men and women that God loves this world... (The preacher describes the duty to tell, rather than telling it performatively).

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a 'State of the Union' for the PNBC. It is high on information and inspiration but low on sacramental event-character.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The rhythmic beat orchestrated by trouble and mourning...

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: I have come to see that a church needs to separate...

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is a historical event (a speech), but not a homiletical event (a creative word from God to the hearer).
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The word does not 'happen' to the hearer; it describes what happened to others.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God is the object of the speech, rarely the subject speaking through the preacher.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: The preacher speaks as a convention leader, not as a mandatory of the Divine Word.
tekstueel_bewijs: I make bold to throw out some hints of what it seems to me God is saying.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: The effect is sought through rhetorical 'crescendos' rather than the Spirit's work through the Word.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon is treated as a vehicle for social/political consciousness rather than a means of grace.
tekstueel_bewijs: We see more than the shrines of a nation's memories.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Shift from 'We must tell' (Directive about Assertive) to 'I announce to you' (Declarative).

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: We must tell men and women that God loves this world.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Hear this: God loves you and this ailing world even unto Calvary.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a duty to an encounter.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The 'Power of Blackness' is described as a sociological fact rather than a promised gift.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use Commissives to bind God's power to the hearer's current struggle.
voorbeeldzinnen: God promises you today that your limp will become your power.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: Too much 'We' (collective) and 'He' (MLK/Jesus), not enough 'You' (the hearer).
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Direct address to the individual's need for power.
voorbeeldzinnen: You, who are weary, God is renewing your strength now.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The 'Must' is heavy because the 'Is' is historical rather than present-sacramental.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Base the call to action on the present declaration of Christ's victory.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A rhetorically magnificent speech that serves the community's identity, but requires more performative 'Toezegging' to function as a sacramental event.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the 'Appeal' and 'Self-revelation' of the speaker; SAT reveals the lack of 'Declarative' authority.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetorically, this is a 10/10; homiletically (SAT), it is a 4/10 due to constative surplus.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT exposes that 'talking about' the power of God is not the same as 'giving' the power of God through the word.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: America, what madness is upon you!
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Strong rhetorical impact, but lacks a call to specific local action.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: He gave them power and authority.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Weak. It describes a past empowerment rather than performing a present one.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a masterpiece of Civil Rights rhetoric but demonstrates the 'Constative Surplus' typical of sermons that focus on historical narrative over sacramental address.
